name: loopstudios-landing-page-main
description: ![Design preview for the Loopstudios landing page coding challenge](./design/desktop-preview.jpg)

scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "postcss  src/css/style.css -o src/css/output.css --watch"  "live-server loopstudios-landing-page-main"
scripts.development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently postcss  src/css/style.css -o src/css/output.css
